title: unniDam ODi vandEn
sahitya:
unniDam ODi vandEn urutuNai nADi vandEn janmamidu kaDaittEra cennimalai mannavanE


anupallavi

  tan nigharE illAmal dayai puriginravanE innal urum enniDam irakkamuruvAi enru


caraNam    annaikku iNaiyAgaanbarai aNaikkinra unnaiyanri ennai uyya sheivArillai
panmurai en kuraiyai unnuLLam urugumvarai mEnmElum uraittu ponnaDi paTriDavE
